mapper.insert: insert into tag (TagId, UserId, TagName, CreateTime) values (#{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select TagId, UserId, TagName, CreateTime from tag
select TagId, UserId, TagName, CreateTime from tag where UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
